title: should fail when an invalid input string is given
should return an empty output when empty input string is given
should return one substring with one character when one character is given
should return a whole input string when only one character is repeated in the input
should return two substrings when 0 and 1 are repeated once for each (increasing order)
should return two substrings when 0 and 1 are repeated once for each (decreasing order)
should return a correct substring when a longest substring is placed in the middle
